sections.heading: Exemption from jury serviceExemptions from jury service shall be as provided by rules of the Louisiana Supreme Court pursuant to Section 33(B) of Article V of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974
sections.text: Amended by Acts 1968, No. 108, ยง1; Acts 1970, No. 450, ยง1; Acts 1972, No. 35, ยง1; Acts 1972, No. 282, ยง1;
